DOC.criteria: 1 ) age 18 65 year 2 ) body mass index ( BMI ) 7 27 45 kg/m2 . 1. report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) 8 ( medical condition could limit exercise safety reason require obtain write physician consent participate investigation ) 2. report unable walk 2 block ( 1/4 mile ) without stop 3. currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication lose > 5 % body weight past 6 month 4. report major psychiatric disease organic brain syndrome 5. bariatric surgery planning bariatric surgery within next 4 month 6. intend move outside metropolitan area within time frame investigation 7. pregnant , lactating , < 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant investigation .
